name: Eva Patrick
text: The pizza is good, but they need a better staff! I 100% prefer Pizza Hut over Domino’s but twice now I have had to order from dominos. They close at 12 but their last delivery person left home at 10? The staff needs to step it up. They should be able to deliver until they close.

text: Good food done right. Kaitlyn, one of the CSRs is always courteous and professional. Love this Pizza Hut.

name: Lisa Villa
text: Just don’t bother going here. They mess up and give your order to someone else. Then they don’t even tell you they are re-doing order. Then when you get the pizza after 1 hour it’s uncooked mostly. They wouldn’t give me my Money back …More

name: Brent V
text: I really like their pizzas (when they make them correctly) Stuffed crust is great. But my last two app orders were messed up. First time they didn't make the second pizza. (2 large they only made 1) The second time one pizza was missing half the toppings I ordered, and both pizzas were missing the garlic crust sauce.

name: Tanner Gray
text: It's a pizza place, mistakes are going to happen. 3 times in a row, order was wrong... one of the three times, I ordered delivery. They flat out never showed, or called. I just let it go. Tried to call this last time, while continuously …More

name: Wilma Rimes
text: A surprisingly great place to enjoy so many great foods.  Huge variety on the menu.  Love to take friends there that don’t know about the many choices.

name: Ty Dierking
text: I always order my pizza and never have they messed up an order. Workers are polite and friendly. It's the only pizza hut close unless u want to drive downtown to the second one. Order may be longer to wait because of their current amount of people that had ordered before u so stop complaining. # Pizza

text: Absolutely horrible! I have never had a good experience with this Pizza Hut. Usually I let it slide, but the last time I went is definitely the last time. I ordered online and went in to pick up my order only to find that they made the …More

This is the first time I leave a 'review' on anything. And it's sad that the only reason I did rate it was to avoid anyone else wasting their money here!

text: Don't go there anymore. When you get a pizza at Pizza Hut it doesn't look like the pizza on the commercials and it doesn't look like the pizza pictures  in the store. Last time there, the pizza was pretty bland. Had order a pepperoni pizza  and the pepperoni was hard to find and was tasteless, just wasn't worth money.

text: They were gracious enough to let us place an order, wait thirty minutes, and show up, just to tell us they were out of garlic twists. I was met with a "do you want something else?" No I don't want anything else. You could have called to …More

text: Awful. Do not order for delivery from here. Ordered and said that it was going to be 30 minutes for delivery, we ended up cancelling the order over an hour and a half later. Pickup is alright, but never ordering delivery from here again.
